00022 #include "ThreadPool.h"
00023 
00024 ThreadPool::ThreadPool(int initThreads, int maxThreads, int lowp, int highp) {
00025         if (lowp > highp)
00026                 throw "Low Priority should be less than Highest Priority";
00027         this->console = false;
00028         this->initThreads = initThreads;
00029         this->maxThreads = maxThreads;
00030         this->lowp = lowp;
00031         this->highp = highp;
00032         tpool = new vector<Thread*> ;
00033         wpool = new TaskPool;
00034         wpool->console = console;
00035         for (int i = 0; i < initThreads; i++) {
00036                 Thread *thread = new Thread();
00037                 thread->console = console;
00038                 tpool->push_back(thread);
00039         }
00040         poller = new boost::thread(boost::bind(&ThreadPool::poll, this));
00041         prioritypooling = true;
00042 }
00043 ThreadPool::ThreadPool(int initThreads, int maxThreads, int lowp, int highp,bool console) {
00044         this->console = console;
00045         if (lowp > highp)
00046                 throw "Low Priority should be less than Highest Priority";
00047         this->initThreads = initThreads;
00048         this->maxThreads = maxThreads;
00049         this->lowp = lowp;
00050         this->highp = highp;
00051         tpool = new vector<Thread*> ;
00052         wpool = new TaskPool;
00053         wpool->console = console;
00054         for (int i = 0; i < initThreads; i++) {
00055                 Thread *thread = new Thread();
00056                 thread->console = console;
00057                 tpool->push_back(thread);
00058         }
00059         poller = new boost::thread(boost::bind(&ThreadPool::poll, this));
00060         prioritypooling = true;
00061 }

00063 ThreadPool::ThreadPool(int initThreads, int maxThreads) {
00064         this->lowp = -1;
00065         this->highp = -1;
00066         this->console = false;
00067         this->initThreads = initThreads;
00068         this->maxThreads = maxThreads;
00069         wpool = new TaskPool;
00070         wpool->console = console;
00071         tpool = new vector<Thread*> ;
00072         for (int i = 0; i < initThreads; i++) {
00073                 Thread *thread = new Thread();
00074                 thread->console = console;
00075                 tpool->push_back(thread);
00076         }
00077         poller = new boost::thread(boost::bind(&ThreadPool::poll, this));
00078 }
00079 
00080 ThreadPool::ThreadPool(int initThreads, int maxThreads,bool console) {
00081         this->console = console;
00082         this->lowp = -1;
00083         this->highp = -1;
00084         this->initThreads = initThreads;
00085         this->maxThreads = maxThreads;
00086         wpool = new TaskPool;
00087         wpool->console = console;
00088         tpool = new vector<Thread*> ;
00089         for (int i = 0; i < initThreads; i++) {
00090                 Thread *thread = new Thread();
00091                 thread->console = console;
00092                 tpool->push_back(thread);
00093         }
00094         poller = new boost::thread(boost::bind(&ThreadPool::poll, this));
00095 }
00096 
00097 void ThreadPool::poll() {
00098         while (true) {
00099                 if (!prioritypooling) {
00100                         if (wpool->tasksPending()) {
00101                                 Task *task = wpool->getTask();
00102                                 Thread *idleThread = getIdleThread();
00103                                 idleThread->task = task;
00104                                 idleThread->idle = false;
00105                                 idleThread->mthread->interrupt();
00106                         } else {
00107                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(100));
00108                         }
00109                 } else {
00110                         if (wpool->tasksPPending()) {
00111                                 Task *task = wpool->getPTask();
00112                                 Thread *idleThread = getIdleThread();
00113                                 idleThread->task = task;
00114                                 idleThread->idle = false;
00115                                 idleThread->mthread->interrupt();
00116                         } else {
00117                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(100));
00118                         }
00119                 }
00120         }
00121 }
00122 Thread* ThreadPool::getIdleThread() {
00123         while (true) {
00124                 for (unsigned int var = 0; var < tpool->size(); var++) {
00125                         if (tpool->at(var)->idle) {
00126                                 return tpool->at(var);
00127                         }
00128                 }
00129                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(40));
00130         }
00131 }
00132 void ThreadPool::joinAll() {
00133         while (true) {
00134                 if (!prioritypooling) {
00135                         while (wpool->tasksPending()) {
00136                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(1000));
00137                         }
00138                 } else {
00139                         while (wpool->tasksPPending()) {
00140                                 boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(1000));
00141                         }
00142                 }
00143                 int i = 0;
00144                 for (unsigned int var = 0; var < tpool->size(); var++) {
00145                         if (tpool->at(var)->idle) {
00146                                 i++;
00147                         }
00148                 }
00149                 if (i == initThreads) {
00150                         break;
00151                 } else {
00152                         boost::this_thread::sleep(boost::posix_time::milliseconds(1000));
00153                 }
00154         }
00155 }
00156 void ThreadPool::execute(Task &task, int priority) {
00157         if(console)
00158         {
00159                 cout << "Added task to wpool\n" << flush;
00160         }
00161         task.tunit = -1;
00162         task.type = -1;
00163         task.priority = priority;
00164         task.console = console;
00165         if (!prioritypooling) {
00166                 wpool->addTask(task);
00167         } else {
00168                 wpool->addPTask(task);
00169         }
00170 }
00171 void ThreadPool::execute(Task &task) {
00172         if(console)
00173         {
00174                 cout << "Added task to wpool\n" << flush;
00175         }
00176         task.tunit = -1;
00177         task.type = -1;
00178         task.priority = -1;
00179         task.console = console;
00180         if (!prioritypooling) {
00181                 wpool->addTask(task);
00182         } else {
00183                 wpool->addPTask(task);
00184         }
00185 }
00186 void ThreadPool::schedule(Task &task, int tunit, int type) {
00187         if(console)
00188         {
00189                 cout << "Added task to wpool\n" << flush;
00190         }
00191         task.tunit = tunit;
00192         task.type = type;
00193         task.priority = -1;
00194         task.console = console;
00195         if (!prioritypooling) {
00196                 wpool->addTask(task);
00197         } else {
00198                 wpool->addPTask(task);
00199         }
00200 }
00201 
00202 ThreadPool::~ThreadPool() {
00203         delete poller;
00204         delete tpool;
00205         delete wpool;
00206         if(console)
00207         {
00208                 cout << "Destroyed Thread Pool\n" << flush;
00209         }
00210 }
